body_html:
@efernandez yeah, making a .deb would probably be the best solution. I have packaged TensorFlow on Gentoo, you can refer to the ebuild for guidance. I'm not that familiar with debian but i'll definitely help however I can.
Here is the gentoo package, its quite involved but you can hopefully make sense of it:
https://github.com/gentoo/gentoo/blob/master/sci-libs/tensorflow/tensorflow-1.10.0_rc1.ebuild
